parameters.description: Duration in seconds between each repetition
parameters.name: LoopDuration

parameters.longDescription: Maximum nuber of repetition (-1 to repeat forever).
parameters.name: MaxLoop

eventsFunctions.fullName: load image from URL to sprite
eventsFunctions.name: Function3

inlineCode: console.warn("LoadImageFromURL: URL is empty or invalid.");
// Optional: snap overlay image to object size if not replacing resource
// Force renderer to use object size
// console.log(`Overlay image snapped to width: ${width}, height: ${height}`);
console.warn("LoadImageFromURL: Could not snap overlay to object size.", err);
// Optional: mark object as loaded (for custom trigger once in JS)

parameters.description: The URL to load the new image for the sprite from
parameters.name: URL

parameters.longDescription: If yes, modifies the image contained in the resource of the sprite's current frame instead of just the sprite's displayed image. This makes the changes affect all other sprites that also display this resource, and allows the change to persist after changing animations or the current frame.
parameters.name: ChangeResource
